Get SRS historical rating data

cfb_ratings_srs.Rd

At least one of year or team must be specified for the function to run

cfb_ratings_srs(year = NULL, team = NULL, conference = NULL)

Arguments

year

(Integer optional): Year, 4 digit format (YYYY)
team

(String optional): D-I Team
conference

(String optional): Conference abbreviation - SRS information by conference
Conference abbreviations P5: ACC, B12, B1G, SEC, PAC
Conference abbreviations G5 and FBS Independents: CUSA, MAC, MWC, Ind, SBC, AAC

Source

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/ratings/srs

Value

A data frame with 5 variables:

year

integer.

team

character.

conference

character.

division

logical.

rating

character.

Examples


cfb_ratings_srs(year = 2019, team = "Texas")

#> 2020-12-16 01:59:27: Scraping simple rating system (SRS) data...
#>   year  team conference division           rating
#> 1 2019 Texas     Big 12       NA 15.9715403557231

cfb_ratings_srs(year = 2018, conference = 'SEC')

#> 2020-12-16 01:59:27: Scraping simple rating system (SRS) data...
#>    year              team conference division            rating
#> 1  2018           Georgia        SEC     East  26.2706652614136
#> 2  2018           Florida        SEC     East  19.2588532505304
#> 3  2018         Tennessee        SEC     East 0.934055289857118
#> 4  2018    South Carolina        SEC     East  9.65238257014932
#> 5  2018          Kentucky        SEC     East  14.6950441413547
#> 6  2018        Vanderbilt        SEC     East  9.92576388347224
#> 7  2018           Alabama        SEC     West  33.5327042463214
#> 8  2018          Ole Miss        SEC     West  3.45816331017397
#> 9  2018 Mississippi State        SEC     West  19.8323291150704
#> 10 2018          Arkansas        SEC     West -7.15777478158719
#> 11 2018            Auburn        SEC     West  15.0330922527981
#> 12 2018               LSU        SEC     West  18.3332724270277
#> 13 2018          Missouri        SEC     East  18.8779384668495
#> 14 2018         Texas A&M        SEC     West   17.932921991502
